name: CIS Baseline
description: This policy is a baseline for Microsoft 365 that aligns with the Center for Internet Security (CIS) Microsoft 365 Foundations Benchmark v1.1.0.
label: CIS

description: 2.1.2 (L1) Ensure the Common Attachment Types Filter is enabled (Automated)
2.1.3 (L1) Ensure notifications for internal users sending malware is Enabled (Automated)
2.1.14 (L2) Ensure comprehensive attachment filtering is applied (Automated)
6.5.1 (L1) Ensure modern authentication for Exchange Online is enabled (Automated)
6.5.2 (L1) Ensure MailTips are enabled for end users (Automated)
3.2.2 (L1) Ensure DLP policies are enabled for Microsoft Teams (Manual)
